resources.registrationMessageText: Creating an account means you can shop faster, keep up to date on the progress of your current order, and check the status of previous orders.
resources.marketingMailsText: I want to get email updates.
resources.userSessionExpiredErrorMsg: Your checkout session has expired due to inactivity. Please restart checkout.
resources.personalizationConsentText: Show me relevant site content and promotions whilst browsing.
resources.rememberMeText: I want to create an account.
resources.checkoutErrorMsg: Please ensure you have completed all mandatory fields and corrected any invalid entries.
